name: Mini Manic Miner
description:
Direction Fire BulletJump

Poor old Miner Willy!

He just can't get a break.

If it's not one thing, it's another. After having gotten through the 20 levels of the original game, he's transported to another new game.

Tileset and enemies are from the original ZX Spectrum version.

Level design, was (ahem) created by me...( I really need to do better levels.)

I'll be adding a downloadable ROM once I've gotten around to adding more levels, and tidied the game up a bit more.
